programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru»Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le hamster disparu) S1 (22/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le hamster disparu»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Pig) S2 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Pig»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are best friends. But one day they have a quarrel, over a game of cards and decided they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up. When they finally say "sorry" to each other they realise that they will always be the best of friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Trois Mousquemers) S6 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Les Trois Mousquemers»When a Gargoyle steals all the gifts and decorations for Countess Molly's surprise party, the French villagers call in the Three Guppeteers. But will the swashbuckling girls be able to swipe back all the presents in time for la grande fête?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une journée de sport avec Blue) S3 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Une journée de sport avec Blue»Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon»Animated children's series following the adventures of a young pirate, Captain Santiago, and his mishmash of crewmates as they sail the high seas on spectacular quests.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Sea Dragon's Treasure) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Sea Dragon's Treasure»After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée du oui) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «La journée du oui»Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sleeping Like a Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Sleeping Like a Baby»Sleeping Like a Baby: Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement. (S1, ep 18b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les pépites d'or / Le vol du Pat'patrouilleur) S3 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les pépites d'or / Le vol du Pat'patrouilleur»When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it's a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (L'incroyable famille Kamalis) S2 (23/27)
programme.desc: «L'incroyable famille Kamalis»Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa et George emmènent leurs jouets préférés en pique-nique...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»Emilie Eléphant, une petite nouvelle, vient d'arriver à la garderie. Elle est assez timide...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Après avoir regardé leur émission de télévision préférée, Peppa et George veulent, eux-aussi, devenir des détectives fameux. Papa Pig leur donne un mystère à élucider...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Nap»Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le restaurant de Blue) S2 (6/21)
programme.desc: «Le restaurant de Blue»Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (PAW Patrol: Mighty Pups) S5 (n°29)
programme.desc: «PAW Patrol: Mighty Pups»When their latest scheme goes awry, Mayor Humdinger and his nephew Harold accidentally divert a meteor towards Adventure Bay. The meteor's golden energy grants the PAW Patrol superpowers! The heroic MIGHTY PUPS are on a roll to super-save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (30/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Metal Detector»Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza in 'Snowball Bonanza', and in 'The Present', Baby Shark goes undercover to get the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»Shark Strength: When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength. (S1, ep 16a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (n°54)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»En compagnie de sa famille et de ses amis, Peppa joue sur la mare avec de petits bateaux. Seule Rebecca Rabbit n'en possède pas...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Monsieur l'épouvantail) S2 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Monsieur l'épouvantail»Peppa et George sont allés rendre visite à leurs grands-parents. Grandpa Pig confectionne un épouvantail pour effrayer les corbeaux qui mangent ses récoltes...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La capsule du temps) S2 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La capsule du temps»A la garderie, madame Gazelle explique aux enfants ce qu'est une capsule du temps et en enterre une...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»Peppa et George aident Maman Pig à faire la vaisselle. Elle leur apprend alors à recycler les bouteilles ainsi que les journaux...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au secours du chiot) S6 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Au secours du chiot»The Puppy Chase!: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back. (S6, ep 8).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le pouvoir du recyclage) S5 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Le pouvoir du recyclage»When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Cloche de Plongée / Les Castors) S2 (4/26)
programme.desc: «La Cloche de Plongée / Les Castors»Cap'n Turbot and his cousin Francois go deep sea diving to snap a picture of a rare seaslug - the only problem is their diving bell ends up stuck, and then the propeller fin breaks at the bottom of the bay! It's PAW Patrol to the rescue, and they have just the right vehicle - Zuma's new SUBMARINE! // A bad storm washes away Chompy the Beaver's dam, so he starts chomping on all the wood at Farmer Yumi's Farm! Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to fix the chomped Barn and Fence, but that's just the beginning. Chompy has been chowing down all over town! Chase has to track the busy Beaver, while the rest of the Pups help rebuild Chompy's home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Grande Vallée Sous la Neige / Le Match de Basketball) S2 (8/26)
programme.desc: «La Grande Vallée Sous la Neige / Le Match de Basketball»A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. Mayor Goodway's car hit's an icy patch and gets stuck in the snow. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue, but the roads aren't the only thing affected by the ice. The Engineer's train can't break on the icy tracks and it's headed for a huge snow drift on the crossing! Ryder, Rubble, and EVEREST have to get there in time and clear out all the snow and ice! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger's Basketball team to a game. The only thing Mayor Goodway is missing though is a...Basketball team! She calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol for help, and Ryder thinks the pups would make a great team! The pups become the Adventure Bay All-Stars and they'll need everyone, including a reluctant Marshall, to pitch in and help win one for Mayor Goodway and the town. Nothing but net!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Deer Ball) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Deer Ball»Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru»Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vive le camping) S2 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Vive le camping»The whole Peppa's class goes to the school camp! Great fun of course and also a bit exciting. Especially at night when they hear strange noises. Fortunately, Mrs. Gazelle is there with the Bing Bong Song.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'armoire à jouets) S2 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'armoire à jouets»Peppa and George have so many toys that they no longer fit in their cleaning basket. That's why Mama Pig decides to buy a toy cabinet with the computer. But then the cupboard has to be put together, and Papa Pig is not very handy ... Hajeto!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Pig) S2 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Pig»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are best friends. But one day they have a quarrel, over a game of cards and decided they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up. When they finally say "sorry" to each other they realise that they will always be the best of friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Trois Mousquemers) S6 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Les Trois Mousquemers»When a Gargoyle steals all the gifts and decorations for Countess Molly's surprise party, the French villagers call in the Three Guppeteers. But will the swashbuckling girls be able to swipe back all the presents in time for la grande fête?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une journée de sport avec Blue) S3 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Une journée de sport avec Blue»Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon»Animated children's series following the adventures of a young pirate, Captain Santiago, and his mishmash of crewmates as they sail the high seas on spectacular quests.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Sea Dragon's Treasure) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Sea Dragon's Treasure»After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La journée du oui) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «La journée du oui»Baby convinces Daddy to say "yup" to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sleeping Like a Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Sleeping Like a Baby»Sleeping Like a Baby: Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement. (S1, ep 18b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les pépites d'or / Le vol du Pat'patrouilleur) S3 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les pépites d'or / Le vol du Pat'patrouilleur»When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it's a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (L'incroyable famille Kamalis) S2 (23/27)
programme.desc: «L'incroyable famille Kamalis»Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de brume) S2 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de brume»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de George) S2 (26/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de George»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les petites bêtes) S2 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Les petites bêtes»All kind of animals can be seen in Grandpa Pig's garden. At first Peppa is startled by a snail, but when she looks at it carefully, she wants to imitate it. And when Peppa's friends come too, the garden is full of little critters!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chanson de Blue) S1 (8/17)
programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (n°34)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (n°35)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa wins a ride in Miss Rabbit's hot air balloon and the whole family comes along. Peppa drops Teddy and Papa Pig saves him. But if they get stuck in a tree, who will come and save them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Comme Pedro son ami porte des lunettes, Peppa pense qu'elle en a besoin elle-aussi. Maman Pig l'emmène alors chez l'occuliste pour vérifier sa vue...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is... complicated. Peppa and George have a go at each job. They love working at Daddy's office.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and her friends on a boat trip to pirate island to dig for treasure. Ahhhh ... while they are building a sand castle Grandpa fell asleep on the boat and drifted away ... What now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'incroyable Chacrobate) S6 (n°3)
programme.desc: «L'incroyable Chacrobate»When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Big Rig to the Rescue!) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Big Rig to the Rescue!»When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent) S3 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent»Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol and recruits Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. But when their actions attract the attention of a hungry eagle, Alex has to rescue his own team. // Alex loses his first tooth... then really loses it. He can't find it anywhere! The Paw Patrol is hot on the tooth's trail, and everyone is determined to find it before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur) S3 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur»When a boy named Danny sees Ryder perform an incredible stunt during a rescue, it inspires him to become a daredevil. When Danny attempts a risky stunt, Ryder and the pups use the Air Patroller for a daring mid-air rescue! // Ryder entrusts the care of Adventure Bay to Robo-Dog while he and the Pups take a well-deserved break. But Robo-Dog goes on a fixing rampage, and Ryder and the Pups must cut their vacation short to save him!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!
